website_summaries.verdict: These insulated glasses – available as a 2-pack – are great to use outside or at social gatherings given their durable yet sleek design.
pros: Comes as a pack of 2 and conveniently dishwasher safe
Double-walled insulation prevents condensation, even outside in heat and humidity
Sleek look, although they are quite durable
cons: Cups do not come with lids

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: One glass is perfect and amazing. But the other glass wasn’t sealed properly and will not dry. Water and soap gets into the insulated part and will never dry. Update: I’m assuming seller saw my review and ended up sending me a replacement glass without even asking! Thank you seller! That waspretty amazing on their part. The replacement glass seems to be working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Both stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite wine glasses. They are much more stable than stems, easy to hold (even with arthritic hands), and good for red or white wine. They are also attractive and real glass so wine tastes fine. They aren't unbreakable, but it took a major crash to destroy one. (Clumsy me breaks a lot of glasses, so I know!) It did not shatter into a thousand tiny shards, just a few large pieces, which was a relief. I didn't hesitate to order 2 more. Now I have 3!
customer_reviews.author: SusanDC

customer_reviews.title: Like ALWAYS put liquid in the glasses then ICE
customer_reviews.text: Exactly and I mean exactly what we wanted!!!! My only complaint is the seller gave instructions, not on the product insert, but ON the box in hard to read LIGHT LETTERING. I almost missed the really important stuff. Like ALWAYS put liquid in the glasses then ICE. Oh, these really hold the cold well with a liquid and ice on a really hot day like in Arizona. Your hands do not heat the glass. Important for wines, too.
customer_reviews.author: meme.

customer_reviews.title: I like these glasses quite a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses quite a lot, but be warned, they are hand blown and there are variations in the volume they will hold. In the pair I received one was 12 ounces the other 13. I let the seller know and they promptly sent another, so no complaints about customer service. If the glass being 12 or 13 ounces doesn't matter, these are the glasses for you. Very light and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses have a quality feel about them. They just feel good in the hand. I tried the stainless steel variety and they were well made but I sometimes didn't feel comfortable with my grip on them. They nearly slipped from my hand a few times. I don't have that problem with the Eparé glasses. Excellent product and will be my choice if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: dvan@VAB

customer_reviews.title: We use a lot of ice in Florida and use insulated plastic tumblers for many drinks even though we don't like plastic that much
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for gifts. Arrived promptly and exceed expectations. Think simple elegance. We use a lot of ice in Florida and use insulated plastic tumblers for many drinks even though we don't like plastic that much. We have always thought it would be nice to have insulated glasses and the wine glasses in actual glass. Now we know they exist, we may order more for ourselves and friends. I've post this same review for whisky tumblers as same comments apply.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Water gets in between the walls of the glass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and had to ask for replacements three times because water gets into the space between the walls of the glass. I received replacement the first two times, but I am still waiting (two months, since April 26) for the third replacement. THESE DON'T WORK. Imagine drinking from a glass in which the water has been stagnating between the walls for weeks. Blech!
customer_reviews.author: Doug K.

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses

product_meta.title: Eparé Wine Glasses - 13oz Set of 2 - Double-Walled Glassware - Stemless Drinking Glass - Red & White Wine Tumblers
feature_bullets: STUNNING DOUBLE-WALLED DESIGN: Cabernet looks even better than it tastes in this elegant barware vessel. With no stem you can fill them with your favorite coffee, espresso, cocktail, champagne, beer or martini. They make a cheap drink look expensive!

KEEP DRINKS COLD LONGER: The double-wall construction adds a layer of insulation between the inside and outside glass. So whether white wines are your jam or you prefer to fill them with hot coffee, these glasses keep your drinks hot or cold longer.

MADE OF HANDBLOWN BOROSILICATE GLASS: They're pretty, but tough and durable too. While lighter and thinner than other glasses, they're made from hand-blown borosilicate glass and are built for everyday use. And they're dishwasher and microwave safe.

CONDENSATION RESISTANT: The insulation effect of the double-wall design also enable the glasses to remain room temperature and resist the formation of condensation on the outside glass. So you won't have to worry about rings on your favorite table.

EPARÉ TRUSTED QUALITY: You will receive two (2) Wine Glasses measuring 5.25 inches tall and 3.5 inches in diameter. They weigh just 6.6 ounces and have a full 13 ounce capacity. We stand behind our quality.
